trans-unit.source: The channel to be used to connect to the service.
trans-unit.target: 用于连接服务的通道。

trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation used to create Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) client objects that can call services.
trans-unit.target: 提供用于创建可调用服务的 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 客户端对象的基实现。

trans-unit.source: Extend the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> class to create a custom WCF client object that can be used to connect to a service.
trans-unit.target: 扩展<xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601>类，以创建可以用于连接到服务的自定义 WCF 客户端对象。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the WCF client base class is extended by a tool such as the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) on your behalf.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，WCF 客户端基类扩展由工具如[ServiceModel 元数据实用工具 (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)替你。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the Example section.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参见“示例”一节。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> class can be used quickly and easily by developers who prefer objects to the use of the interfaces and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> class.
trans-unit.target: 有些开发人员喜欢使用对象而不喜欢使用接口和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> 类，那么他们就可以方便快捷地使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> 类。

trans-unit.source: In all cases this class wraps or exposes the methods and functionality of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> class and the <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel?displayProperty=nameWithType> interface.
trans-unit.target: 在任何情况下，此类都会包装或公开 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> 类和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel?displayProperty=nameWithType> 接口的方法和功能。

trans-unit.source: As when using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost?displayProperty=nameWithType> class, you can create the class and modify the endpoint, channel factory, or security information prior to making any calls or calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.Open%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 比如在使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ServiceHost?displayProperty=nameWithType> 类时，您可以在进行任何调用或调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.Open%2A> 之前创建类并修改终结点、通道工厂或安全信息。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [WCF Client Overview](~/docs/framework/wcf/wcf-client-overview.md) and [Accessing Services Using a WCF Client](~/docs/framework/wcf/accessing-services-using-a-wcf-client.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[WCF 客户端概述](~/docs/framework/wcf/wcf-client-overview.md)和[使用 WCF 客户端访问服务](~/docs/framework/wcf/accessing-services-using-a-wcf-client.md)。

trans-unit.source: Special note for Managed C++ users deriving from this class:
trans-unit.target: 针对从此类派生的托管 C++ 用户的特别说明：

trans-unit.source: Put your clean-up code in (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort), not in a destructor.
trans-unit.target: 将清理代码加入 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）中，而不是加入析构函数中。

trans-unit.source: Avoid destructors: they cause the compiler to auto-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用析构函数：它们会导致编译器自动生成 <xref:System.IDisposable>。

trans-unit.source: Avoid non-reference members: they can cause the compiler to auto-generate <xref:System.IDisposable>.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用非引用成员：它们可能会导致编译器自动生成 <xref:System.IDisposable>。

trans-unit.source: Avoid finalizers; but if you include one, you should suppress the build warning and call <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%28System.Object%29> and the finalizer itself from (On)(Begin)Close (and/or OnAbort) to emulate what would have been the auto-generated <xref:System.IDisposable> behavior.
trans-unit.target: 避免使用终结器；但如果包含一个终结器，则应该禁止显示生成警告并从 (On)(Begin)Close（和/或 OnAbort）调用 <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%28System.Object%29> 和终结器本身，以便模拟自动生成的 <xref:System.IDisposable> 行为。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how the [ServiceModel Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md) extends the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> class to create a WCF client class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何[ServiceModel 元数据实用工具 (Svcutil.exe)](~/docs/framework/wcf/servicemodel-metadata-utility-tool-svcutil-exe.md)扩展<xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601>类来创建 WCF 客户端类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use to create a WCF client object from the endpoint information in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 用于从应用程序配置文件中的终结点信息创建一个 WCF 客户端对象。

trans-unit.source: The main function of the constructor is to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType> where the type parameter is the type of the target service contract.
trans-unit.target: 该构造函数的主要功能是创建 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601?displayProperty=nameWithType>，其中类型参数为目标服务协定的类型。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the default target endpoint from the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 使用应用程序配置文件中的默认目标终结点初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to create a WCF client object to invoke a service.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数创建 WCF 客户端对象来调用服务。

trans-unit.source: This constructor uses the type parameter as the target contract and the binding and address information from the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数使用类型参数（目标协定的类型）和应用程序配置文件中的绑定和地址信息。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how a client uses this constructor in a `SampleServiceClient` class that extends the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示客户端如何在扩展 `SampleServiceClient` 类的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> 类中使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Either there is no default endpoint information in the configuration file, more than one endpoint in the file, or no configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件中没有默认的终结点信息，或者文件中有多个终结点，或者没有配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint for a service that allows clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 允许客户端查找并与服务通信的服务的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the configuration information specified in the application configuration file by <paramref name="endpointConfigurationName" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用应用程序配置文件中由 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 指定的配置信息来初始化 <paramref name="endpointConfigurationName" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when there is more than one target endpoint in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序配置文件中有一个以上的目标终结点时，使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: This value is the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 此值是`name`的客户端属性[<终结点>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)元素。

trans-unit.source: The specified endpoint information is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定的终结点信息为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到终结点或者终结点协定无效。

trans-unit.source: The binding with which to make calls to the service.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用服务的绑定。

trans-unit.source: The address of the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的地址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the specified binding and target address.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的绑定和目标地址初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The remote address is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 远程地址为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the <paramref name="callbackInstance" /> as the callback object in a duplex conversation.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 作为双工对话中的回调对象来初始化 <paramref name="callbackInstance" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor when the service contract requires a callback service instance.
trans-unit.target: 当服务协定需要一个回调服务实例时，使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The target endpoint is constructed from the type parameter and information in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 目标终结点是利用类型参数和应用程序配置文件中的信息来构造的。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use this constructor with a `SampleDuplexHelloClient` class to pass a callback object that listens for messages from the service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何将此构造函数与 `SampleDuplexHelloClient` 类一起使用以传递用于侦听来自服务的消息的回调对象。

trans-unit.source: The callback instance is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 回调实例为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Either there is no default endpoint information in the configuration file, more than one endpoint in the file, or no configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 配置文件中没有默认的终结点信息，或者文件中有多个终结点，或者没有配置文件。

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The address of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的地址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the specified target address and endpoint information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的目标地址和终结点信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to determine the target endpoint information from the name of the endpoint in an application configuration file (The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element) and the specified address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来确定应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称的目标终结点信息 (通过查找找到目标值`name`的客户端属性[<终结点>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)元素) 和指定的地址。

trans-unit.source: The remote address is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 远程地址为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到终结点或者终结点协定无效。

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The address of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的地址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to determine the target endpoint information from the name of the endpoint in an application configuration file (The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element) and the specified address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数来确定应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称的目标终结点信息 (通过查找找到目标值`name`的客户端属性[<终结点>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)元素) 和指定的地址。

trans-unit.source: The remote address is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 远程地址为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到终结点或者终结点协定无效。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint for a service that allows clients to find and communicate with the service.
trans-unit.target: 允许客户端查找并与服务通信的服务的终结点。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> and <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.InstanceContext" /> 对象初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class using the specified callback service and endpoint configuration information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的回调服务和终结点配置信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and determine the target endpoint information from the client application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数传递实现目标服务的回调协定的服务对象，并通过客户端应用程序配置文件确定目标终结点信息。

trans-unit.source: The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element.
trans-unit.target: 通过查找找到目标值`name`的客户端属性[<终结点>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)元素。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 终结点为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到终结点或者终结点协定无效。

trans-unit.source: The binding with which to call the service.
trans-unit.target: 用于调用服务的绑定。

trans-unit.source: The address of the service endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 服务终结点的地址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The remote address is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 远程地址为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The address of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的地址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and determine the target endpoint information from the name of the endpoint in an application configuration file (The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element) and the specified address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数传递实现目标服务的回调协定的服务对象，并确定目标终结点的信息的名称的应用程序配置文件中的终结点 (通过查找找到目标值`name`的客户端属性[<终结点>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)元素) 和指定的地址。

trans-unit.source: The remote address is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 远程地址为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到终结点或者终结点协定无效。

trans-unit.source: The name of the endpoint in the application configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序配置文件中的终结点的名称。

trans-unit.source: The address of the service.
trans-unit.target: 服务的地址。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to pass a service object that implements the callback contract for the target service and determine the target endpoint information from the name of the endpoint in an application configuration file (The target value is located by finding the `name` attribute of the client [<endpoint>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md) element) and the specified address.
trans-unit.target: 使用此构造函数传递实现目标服务的回调协定的服务对象，并确定目标终结点的信息的名称的应用程序配置文件中的终结点 (通过查找找到目标值`name`的客户端属性[<终结点>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpoint-of-client.md)元素) 和指定的地址。

trans-unit.source: The remote address is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 远程地址为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The endpoint cannot be found or the endpoint contract is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 无法找到终结点或者终结点协定无效。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object to transition immediately from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象立即从其当前状态转换到关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cache setting.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置缓存设置。

trans-unit.source: The cache setting.
trans-unit.target: 缓存设置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the inner channel used to send messages to variously configured service endpoints.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于将消息发送到不同配置的服务终结点的内部通道。

trans-unit.source: A channel of a specified type.
trans-unit.target: 指定类型的通道。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取基础 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory`1" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Used to obtain the inner channel factory that handles creation of the channel to the service.
trans-unit.target: 用于获取可创建服务通道的内部通道工厂。

trans-unit.source: Gets the client credentials used to call an operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于调用操作的客户端凭据。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials" /> that represents the proof of identity presented by the client.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials" />，它表示客户端所提供的身份证明。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.ClientCredentials%2A> property to configure the credentials that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> object uses to connect to the service.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.ClientCredentials%2A> 属性可以配置 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> 对象用于连接服务的凭据。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.ClientCredentials%2A> property to set the username and password prior to calling the service.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码演示如何使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.ClientCredentials%2A> 属性在调用服务之前设置用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象从其当前状态转换到关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Returns a new channel to the service.
trans-unit.target: 返回新的服务通道。

trans-unit.source: A channel of the type of the service contract.
trans-unit.target: 一个类型为服务协定的通道。

trans-unit.source: Returns the channel created by the inner channel factory.
trans-unit.target: 返回由内部通道工厂创建的通道。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> can be expected here.
trans-unit.target: 此时，可能会出现由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ChannelFactory%601.CreateChannel%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> 引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: Instructs the inner channel to display a user interface if one is required to initialize the channel prior to using it.
trans-unit.target: 指示内部通道显示在使用通道之前初始化通道时所需的用户界面。

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.DisplayInitializationUI%2A> method if the inner channel requires user interaction prior to constructing the channel.
trans-unit.target: 如果在构造通道之前内部通道需要用户的交互，请调用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.DisplayInitializationUI%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if a user must enter a username and password to secure the channel, that custom <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInteractiveChannelInitializer?displayProperty=nameWithType> can be invoked by calling this method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果用户必须输入用户名和密码以确保通道安全，则可以通过调用此方法来调用自定义的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IInteractiveChannelInitializer?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the target endpoint for the service to which the WCF client can connect.
trans-unit.target: 获取 WCF 客户端可连接的服务的目标终结点。

trans-unit.source: The target endpoint.
trans-unit.target: 目标终结点。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.Endpoint%2A> property to obtain the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> object to inspect or modify prior to using the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.Endpoint%2A> 属性可以获取要在使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceEndpoint?displayProperty=nameWithType> 对象之前检查或修改的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The type that is identified as reference or numeric by the keyword.
trans-unit.target: 由关键字标识为引用或数字的类型。

trans-unit.source: Replicates the behavior of the default keyword in C#.
trans-unit.target: 复制 C# 中默认关键字的行为。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="null" /> if <see langword="T" /> is a reference type and zero if <see langword="T" /> is a numeric value type.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see langword="null" /> 为引用类型，则返回 <see langword="T" />；如果 <see langword="T" /> 为数值类型，则返回零。

trans-unit.source: Gets the underlying <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel" /> implementation.
trans-unit.target: 获取基础 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel" /> 实现。

trans-unit.source: The client channel for the WCF client object.
trans-unit.target: WCF 客户端对象客户端通道。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.InnerChannel%2A> property to obtain the <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel?displayProperty=nameWithType> that is used to connect to the service.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.InnerChannel%2A> 属性可以获取用于连接服务的 <xref:System.ServiceModel.IClientChannel?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that is used for calling the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于调用异步操作的委托。

trans-unit.source: The input values to the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: 异步调用的输入值。

trans-unit.source: A delegate that is used to end the asynchronous call after it has completed.
trans-unit.target: 一个用于在异步调用完成后将其结束的委托。

trans-unit.source: A client-supplied callback that is invoked when the asynchronous method is complete.
trans-unit.target: 一个在异步方法完成时调用的由客户端提供的回调。

trans-unit.source: The callback is passed to the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1.BeginOperationDelegate" />.
trans-unit.target: 系统会将该回调传递给 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1.BeginOperationDelegate" />。

trans-unit.source: The <c>userState</c> object to associate with the asynchronous call.
trans-unit.target: 要与异步调用关联的 <c>userState</c> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for implementing the event-based asynchronous pattern.
trans-unit.target: 为实现基于事件的异步模式提供支持。

trans-unit.source: For more information about this pattern, see [Event-based Asynchronous Pattern Overview](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[基于事件的异步模式概述](~/docs/standard/asynchronous-programming-patterns/event-based-asynchronous-pattern-overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: Provide a unique value, such as a GUID or hash code, in the `userState` parameter for each call to <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.InvokeAsync%28System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%7B%600%7D.BeginOperationDelegate%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.ServiceModel.ClientBase%7B%600%7D.EndOperationDelegate%2CSystem.Threading.SendOrPostCallback%2CSystem.Object%29>, and when each operation is completed, your event handler can determine which instance of the operation raised the completion event.
trans-unit.target: 在 `userState` 参数中，为各个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%601.InvokeAsync%28System.ServiceModel.ClientBase%7B%600%7D.BeginOperationDelegate%2CSystem.Object%5B%5D%2CSystem.ServiceModel.ClientBase%7B%600%7D.EndOperationDelegate%2CSystem.Threading.SendOrPostCallback%2CSystem.Object%29> 调用提供一个唯一值（如 GUID 或哈希代码），这样，当各个操作完成时，您的事件处理程序便可以确定是哪个操作的实例引发了完成事件。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object to transition from the created state into the opened state.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象从已创建状态转换到已打开状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current state of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象的当前状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState" /> of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CommunicationState" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Explicit implementation of the <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> 方法的显式实现。

trans-unit.source: Closes the client object.
trans-unit.target: 关闭客户端对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个关闭 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The method that receives the callback on completion.
trans-unit.target: 完成时接收回调的方法。

trans-unit.source: The state data.
trans-unit.target: 状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" />.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个关闭 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用异步关闭操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The period within which the call must complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在其中完成调用的时间段。

trans-unit.source: The callback object invoked when the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 完成操作时调用的回调对象。

trans-unit.source: The state data.
trans-unit.target: 状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to close the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> with a specified timeout.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个在指定超时内关闭 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous begin close operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用异步开始关闭操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个打开 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The method that receives the callback on completion.
trans-unit.target: 完成时接收回调的方法。

trans-unit.source: The state data.
trans-unit.target: 状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个打开 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用异步打开操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The time within which the call must complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在其中完成调用的时间段。

trans-unit.source: The method that receives the callback on completion.
trans-unit.target: 完成时接收回调的方法。

trans-unit.source: The state data.
trans-unit.target: 状态数据。

trans-unit.source: Begins an asynchronous operation to open the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: 开始一个在指定时间间隔内打开 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> that references the asynchronous open operation.
trans-unit.target: 引用异步打开操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The time within which the call must complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在其中完成调用的时间段。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object to transition from its current state into the closed state.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象从其当前状态转换到关闭状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> used to complete the asynchronous close operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于完成异步关闭操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to close the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 完成一个关闭 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> used to complete the asynchronous end open operation.
trans-unit.target: 用于完成异步结束打开操作的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" />。

trans-unit.source: Completes an asynchronous operation to open the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 完成一个打开 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象的异步操作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The time period within which the call must complete.
trans-unit.target: 必须在其中完成调用的时间段。

trans-unit.source: Causes the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> object to transition from the created state into the opened state within a specified interval of time.
trans-unit.target: 使 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.ClientBase`1" /> 对象在指定的时间间隔内从已创建状态转换到已打开状态。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.CommunicationObject?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
